list_of_reviews.review_title: TOTAL SCAM, TICKET IS NOT SOLVED FOR 6 MONTH!!!
list_of_reviews.review: I were using Gate.io for more then year.  I had VIP level 5, everything was fine until October 11, 2023 my trading was blocked. Any opportunity to buy, sell, withdraw were disabled.The error was "The system has detected a security risk with your account, so we have activated the account fund protection function for you. To disable the function, please submit a ticket and contact customer support." I have immidiately created ticket #1182243. The support were only sending the default messages like i need to wait patiently and the team is working on my case. Then on 4th month of ticket they requested statements, proof of work and income. I had provided everything they have asked for.Later the error message was rephrased as "Your account has been placed under protection due to detected potential risks. To lift this protection, please submit a ticket.".Ticket is unsolved for 6 month already.Last reply from Gate.io in ticket was month ago. They are simply ignoring my messages or sending default one: The team is working on my issue and so on...6 months have passed but I still haven't any information about a reason of blocking, Gate.io havent explained anything.I have messaged Gate.io support via email, i had created topic on Reddit, i had messaged support in X(Twitter), tried to contact my manager via Telegram - nothing helped!!!

The ticket number is 1110366Its already 4days and what i got to listen from gate io is, wait we are looking after this.

It's a scam. they failed to get their house in order, and are now asking for verification on accounts. Arbitrarily decline the verification and say they will freeze all assets within 7 days.They lie about tickets being submitted (say they are not from your own account so won't process them), refuse to allow transfers out below a certain amount, but say you will lose access unless you transfer your money out.Just totally geared up to steal money under the pretence of abiding by regulations (which they aren't).Update: the reply below is BS and not  reflective of how these scammers are operating. Nothing about another way to verify, and no way to remove funds. Submitted a ticket. They lied when I followed up and said the ticket wasn't submitted from my account. Provided further evidence... Silence.

Even these unhelpful responses each takes 1,2 days at least for you to receive which again keeps you in such blocked state forever. Their online chat support person tells you sth like "oh we are so sorry, I will escalate this to our review team/ senior team blabla" which never ever did a thing to my case and nobody got back to me. Complete scam. Avoid for sure. I'm going to claim my monies back from my credit card support as I have proof of all my communications with them already.

They say I can also apply another ticket. Which means I have to wait another month to get a reply. I will send another ticket, but I don't dare to cancel other running bots. I am so afraid that I will lose all of my fund. I do not recommend gate.io.

I am extremely disappointed with the service received. My friend sent me shx tokens to my gate.io account. I hold my hands up. He didn’t input a memo therefore I didn’t  receive the funds. The funds are sitting in gate.io account. I have requested for the funds to either be returned back to my friends address or to the intended account which is mine. I have supplied all the KYC documents and told it has been referred to the specialist team for the funds to be returned and worked as a priority. But nothing. Since this update I have chased up and given the same automated response stating the team are yet to pick this up. To confirm this has now been going on for 4 months and still not resolved. I have never experienced such customer service with any exchange and really am thinking of closing my account and using another platform. I will update my review daily to give a true reflection how long it will take to resolve from today. To confirm the ticket id is 1256841.

I am a fairly long-time user of the gate exchange. Everything was fine until the last moment. I bought on the stock exchange and made a withdrawal of 205 TON coins. id: 57333649 txid: WERzkQ0rjNDcFPKDf2J5p6lilehrHuUssMkn8Wk5aoA=I didn't receive coins to my wallet and started to figure out what was going on.  I looked at the transaction in explorer and saw that the coins for this transaction were returned to the sender. I immediately created ticket 1116217, I thought that such a simple problem would be solved quickly and I would get my coins back quickly, but it turned out completely differently.  Support started asking for a screenshot of the refund from the recipient's platform. Of course, this turned out to be impossible because the recipient did not receive anything to return anything.  They don't seem to read my answers, they require a screenshot, which is impossible to get, since the coins returned to the gate in the withdrawal transaction from the gate.  Why the support requests a screenshot that cannot be obtained is unclear to me. Gate does not want to give me coins and therefore makes requests that cannot be fulfilled? The support sees that the problem is in the withdrawal transaction from the gate, and the coins are back, I did not receive them. What do I do not understand

Absolutely the worst experience ever. Ive been using Gate to Spot Trade different cryptos and after I tried to transfer my money from the exchange to a cold wallet they just blocked my transfer and with it the whole account. Extended KYC has been done before I started trading. They asked for a lot of documents which have been provided the day they asked for and still I get the same copy paste answers every time I follow up with the support. (10 Days by now) This is an absolute nightmare and I already lost a lot of money due to the fact that I can not sell / buy / transfer anything. Same copy paste answer for a week straight: "This issue has been forwarded to our specialist to check it for you, if there are any updates, we will let you know" So if any of the specialists reads this: Ticket #1324874 in case anyone can help to unblock my account and give me back my money.

However, there are significant concerns raised by some users, including allegations of scams, issues with money being stolen, unresolved pending tickets, lack of follow-up from customer service, problematic verification systems, and difficulties with logging in. These negative experiences point to critical areas for improvement, particularly in customer support, security, and account accessibility. To enhance user trust and satisfaction, the service provider should investigate these issues, improve their verification and login processes, and ensure more responsive and effective customer support.

On the 25th of March , 2 MONTHS AGO NOW, I attempted to withdraw my USDT from GATE.IO amounting to just over $7,800 , in which I swapped for my BTC at the time as I wanted to sell and buy back at a lower price. Immediately, they put the status of my withdrawal to VERIFYING. I then opened a ticket , number 1081360, asking why my withdrawal was stuck on verifying? For the next 4 weeks, every single day I had to join the live chat to beg for updates. I sent them every document that exists in my life. They wanted payslips , all bank statements, selfies with me holding my CARD DETAILS , THEY EVEN WANTED MY CARD DETAILS, PROOF OF ADDRESS , EVERYTHING YOU CAN THINK OF. I sent them EVERYTHING. But still they weren’t releasing my money. Now 2 months on, the live chat now tell me ‘they cannot help me anymore, the only way to contact the team on my case is to email them’ - I EMAILED THEM 10/15 TIMES OVER THE PAST 4/6 WEEKS WITH NO REPLY/ NO UPDATE. So I’m basically just being ignored while they have my money. I’ve filled out the same questionnaire they asked for about 3 times. I’ve sent them every bit of my life. And now they just say they can’t help me. Im exhausted. I’m depressed. I’m struggling as I have a massive loan to pay. I am at a wall with this company. This is a serious amount of money for me that they have just taken from me and won’t release. Do I need to say any more? I would advise to stay away at all costs , I don’t wish this on anyone . And looking through reviews on this and other websites , this is happening FAR TO OFTEN. It’s an absolute disgrace. Ticket number 1081360 .

I've been a client of Gate.io around 1.5 years. On 15 Aug 2023 my trading was blocked. No ability to buy, sell, withdraw.The error was "The system has detected a security risk with your account, so we have activated the account fund protection function for you. To disable the function, please submit a ticket and contact customer support."Later it was rephrased as "Your account has been placed under protection due to detected potential risks. To lift this protection, please submit a ticket.".Ticket 921617 was created to resolve the issue. In April 2024 they closed this ticket due to inactivity (ha-ha) and I needed to open new ticket 1104474. Till now the second ticket is not solved.From the beginning I was told again and again to wait patiently and the team is working on my case.Last reply from Gate.io in the second ticket was saying there are no new information for my case.9 months have passed but I still haven't any information about a reason of blocking. Nothing was explained to me or requested from me.

Still I didn’t have any good experience, I open my account long time and deposit and bought some crypto. This month when am trying to log in to my account I cannot. I don't advise anybody to use

list_of_reviews.review_title: Unable to withdraw funds in UK

list_of_reviews.review: Firstly. their website is not dynamic, like most other website that deals with ever changing prices, it does not auto update as you sit on their site, you have to constantly refresh the page to see the latest updates to prices etc. Also thy will sell you coins that are geo graphically locked to different countries which should to be traded outside of those countries. They couldn't care less if you lose your money or it is trapped in some coin their exchange should not have sold you in the first place. When you try to get help  the people who are offering support are either stupid or a mix of both as it is so hard to get them to do anything and they seem to think every problem int he world can be solved with a screenshot when they can't it will take you 30 minutes plus to get past this stage when trying to get them to resolve any issue at all. I have been trying to develop a automatic trading python script since Christmas 2023 and its June 2024 now. I have been putting in 18 hour days, and I'm convinced Gate dot io / Gate dot us, are very sophisticated scammer websites. This site is scamming us, every way I turn when using their site I see small clues indicating it. I really do advise go somewhere else, anywhere else, these people cannot be trusted. If your opinion differ to mine don't tell me about it, I couldn't care less. If my comments bother you so much go outside and scream at a tree about it, this is my experience with that site and it is interesting to see I am not the only one who thinks this..

TO ALL INVESTORS: BEWARE OF THEM - THEY ARE NOT RESOLVING ANY ACC COMPLIANCE ISSUES AND THEY ARE TAGGING PEOPLE WRONGLY !!!!!!!!!I am writing this review out of sheer frustration and desperation due to the unresolved issue with my account, which has been tagged for compliance reasons. Despite numerous communications and providing all requested documentation, my account remains frozen, causing significant financial losses. Here are the details:- Income Proof: I have submitted my Payoneer income statement and a letter of good standing from Payoneer, a reputable financial institution. It seems these documents were either not received or not properly reviewed! - Credit Card Use: I have never used a credit card for transactions on your platform, only bank transfers. Therefore, the repeated requests for credit card details are irrelevant to my case! I was asked in the last EDD to attach photos of the card i have used and the transaction for it connected to your platform and i never ever used card, i have only bought with bank transfers, how come you ask me of sth which was never used ?!?!!- Questionnaire: I have completed multiple questionnaires, including the latest one ending with "3418". Despite this, I have not received a single meaningful response or resolution. My latest case ID is 1146911 in which i have posted a proof that my last questionaire is sent/finished. - Transaction Details: Since I have never used a credit card with Gate Connect, I can only provide details of my bank transfers! Again, you want some card transactions, and i never used a card!!!The prolonged delay in resolving this issue is unacceptable. I requested an immediate meeting to address these matters directly with the chat support and i was told that I am not with high priority and meetings were not a way of communication, so all the current communication method (chats, emails, cases) is ineffective!Your last reply did not address my concerns adequately, all issues persist, and none have been resolved.I am extremely displeased with the service I have received. My account has been locked for weeks, previous cases were closed without resolution, and I do not believe my previously submitted EDD questionnaires were ever reviewed.Gate.io, I urge you to take immediate action to resolve this issue. I need access to my funds and a proper resolution without further delay!!!!!!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: ‼️SCAM‼️😥🥲Beware of Gate.io: Scam Practices and Denied Withdrawals
list_of_reviews.review: Folks, if you don’t want to lose your money and want to keep everything intact, do not work with this scammer. It’s not even worth depositing a single USDT with them. I have been using Binance and depositing for years without any issues. I decided to use Gate.io once, and then this happened: About three months ago, I requested a withdrawal of 2400 USDT, which is still pending.I had to create four tickets to reach someone, and then they asked for proof of funds. I submitted all the necessary documents and have been waiting for three months, but no one responds to my tickets or inquiries.Moreover, they asked for an endless list of documents, making me feel insecure – no data protection! Everything possible: photos, credit card numbers, pay slips, registration certificates, names, passports – they demanded everything I own in terms of documents. Even photos with a selfie and the date of the withdrawal, and other ridiculous things that not even the FBI would require. It was all just an excuse to delay the withdrawal and complicate my life. But I was persistent and provided everything until they ran out of excuses. Then they simply stopped responding to my requests. The last email said, “We have forwarded your request to the relevant department.” But the relevant department never responds and takes months, which seems like a lie.You have three days to respond to my tickets 1121343 and 1136953 or simply release my money, otherwise, I will involve my lawyer. What kind of fraud is this? What kind of people are you? This platform is the worst experience I’ve ever had. I can only advise you to stay away, people. It all looks like a scam. There’s no way this platform respects its customers.Lastly: You should be banned. Governments should revoke your licenses, you scammers!

list_of_reviews.review: Folks, if you don’t want to lose your money and want to keep everything intact, do not work with this scammer. It’s not even worth depositing a single USDT with them. I have been using Binance and depositing for years without any issues. I decided to use Gate.io once, and then this happened: About three months ago, I requested a withdrawal of 2400 USDT, which is still pending.I had to create four tickets to reach someone, and then they asked for proof of funds. I submitted all the necessary documents and have been waiting for three months, but no one responds to my tickets or inquiries.Moreover, they asked for an endless list of documents, making me feel insecure – no data protection! But I was persistent and provided everything until they ran out of excuses. Then they simply stopped responding to my requests. The last email said, “We have forwarded your request to the relevant department.” But the relevant department never responds and takes months, which seems like a lie.You have three days to respond to my tickets 1121343 and 1136953 or simply release my money, otherwise, I will involve my lawyer. What kind of fraud is this? What kind of people are you? This platform is the worst experience I’ve ever had. I can only advise you to stay away, people. It all looks like a scam. There’s no way this platform respects its customers.Lastly: You should be banned. Governments should revoke your licenses, you scammers!

After I made the withdraw, they took it on "Verifying" state and I received a text message saying it usually takes 1-8 hours. After 2.5 months and sending bunch of documents, proof of identity pictures and questionnaires. I am still waiting to get my money. I don't even know if I will get my money or not. I will edit my review if I receive my money.Only reply I am getting from them is, please wait our specialists are working on it for 1 month. I sent every document they asked for.Ticket Number: #1305119

Since February, there have been two pending withdrawals, and all my money is blocked. I sent them what they asked of me, and they are delaying solving my problem for a reason I do not know. So far, I am trying to contact them, and no one is responding, and this is the ticket #1321031

One day, I decided to buy some coins as investment to store them on my Metamask wallet for better days. I found Gate.io who had the coins. Checked some Reddit threads and found that it's legit. Was looked like.I passed all the KYCs, bought the coins and tried to withdraw them to my wallet. And got it blocked.So now I'm sending their Support the same documents over and over again and see no results or resolving. I already sent them all the answers, documents, payslips, but receive the same questionnaire with the same list of docs again and again.For me it looks like complete scam.So be sure to avoid them.If Gate.io will prove it's legit service and unlock my money, I'll update this review. Until then I would strongly recommend to avoid Gate.io in every possible way!UPDATE: This scammers asked me for payslips, bank statements again, and then asked to clarify some additional info in new questionnaire. But I didn't recieve any on email and asked to resend it to me again. And you know what, today the closed the ticket. 20+ days and no results, ticket is closed. My money is blocked, I am scammed.Ticket number 1142011

Gate.io Scammer! please help me and reply to my ticket if you really want to give my money Ticket number: 1136953 I have been waiting for my USDT 2400 payout for two months, support writes back to my ticket once a month with standard messages, they don't respond to emails, very bad support, I feel cheated, I think my money was withdrawn, gate io is a scam

list_of_reviews.review_title: Ghosted by gate.io after full verification
list_of_reviews.review: Ticket Number: 1274660AVOID gate.io unless you want to lose access to all your funds to this shameless scammer platform. I lost my phone and with it access to Google Authenticator linked to my gate.io account. After being fully verified by gate.io for it to unbind the authenticator in late March, they ghosted me and I did not hear from them again. That was over two months ago. Also, their verification method was so antiquated in 2024 that it was a real pain. The same issue I had was resolved by other crypto exchanges including Binance and Kraken within a week after I contacted them. I thought as gate.io is registered in Cayman Islands, it would be relatively reliable. How wrong I was!!

STAY AWAY from them. They blocked UK users to trade without notification email and now when I want to withdraw my coins they block me, giving me a "Requesting too quick" error after I choose the coin and insert the address. The worst exchange that I have used so far. Don't deposit a penny, they scam you.I don't know if what they do is legal.I hope they get hit with a class action lawsuit, I'll be one of the victims among thousands

list_of_reviews.review_title: Problems for P2P merchants on gate io
list_of_reviews.review: I'm verified merchant on crypto p2p platforms. Recently I opened account on gate io . Within 24 hours I got message I can't withdraw or trade p2p for 24 hours. I talked to customer service and they said specialist will solve the issue soon. After 18  hours or so issue was solved. Come the third day I got the same issue same response from customer service and I'm sitting ducks with my money stuck in gate io. Very bad experience.

I'm disappointed.I am a fairly long-time user of the gate exchange. Everything was fine untill two weeks ago when I transferd 3200 usdt from binance to gate io and not recieved it yet.Even after many follow ups the " specialists" not solved ticket number 1332102. Update: 23 days later still not sorted.Worst customer support with only copy paste reply. Update. 11. 06 my funds was returned

list_of_reviews.review_title: Every time I hit up support
list_of_reviews.review: Every time I hit up support, it's the same story: wait, but we can't tell you when you'll get your money. Their intentions are shadier than a palm tree in July; it's clear they don't plan to pay me. I'm telling you, steer clear of this clowns. I've never had to deal with such long wait or pay extra just to get paid with summit sage. They've been saving grace these days.

I opened an account to exchange FLT.Did all verifications, waited 24 hours, and then the withdraw via Gate Connect to flat currency failed after a few minutes without reason.The money is now missing and my ticket 1358261 has gone silent for a week, after they sent it to some specialist.UPDATE: The money was returned after 2 weeks. Other operations such as convert and crypto withdrawal are very smooth. I don't know what's wrong with their flat currency withdrawal. Anyway I'll use a local Finnish provider for that and keep my gate account for crypto trades and deposits.
Deposit not credited (700 MATIC) 15h 20.06.2024First time i got a issue (+50, 100 withdraw/deposit) (I will update if any update)UPDATE SOLVED THANKS LEGIT ECEX

The bot tell me it will be refund after less than 24h, now it is 50h.Update/answer: as I said, there are no withdraw history, I have send order history to get that 4500USDT in the ticket

Scamers , put my transactions in verify mode for no reason. When i contact them the ask me to verify my identity, and i did so... But it wasent  good enough. Well, they got all the information they asked for first. But then they want things that dosent exist . Why ? Because they have Fu**ng stolen more then 20000$

I recently purchased some BTC and have a fully KYC-verified account. However, when I attempted to withdraw, my withdrawal was locked without any explanation. Initially, I was told my account wasn't verified. Later, I was asked to provide a selfie with my ID card and my bank transaction history. Despite submitting all the requested documents and photos, my messages are now being ignored.This experience has led me to believe this exchange is a scam and should be avoided.Update: UID I will not provide here for public but you can find my ticket 1147546.

Where do I start. Gate.io have the worst support I have ever experienced. To confirm mistakenly I sent SHX coins without a memo to my family members account. He never received due to me not inputting the memo. After 5 months and raising about 15 tickets I am still waiting for the funds to be returned back to my wallet. The very last update I got I have copy and pasted below confirming they will refund.‘’Oleg (gate.io)Jun 20, 2024, 17:04 GMT+8Dear User, Thank you for contacting Gate.io Help Center. Yes, it will be refunded to the original place. I have once again reported your issue for processing. Please be patient while we handle it. Should you have any further questions, please don't hesitate to reach out. Thank you for choosing Gate.io. Have a great day!Best Regards,Gate.io Support Oleg ‘’Now as mentioned above this has gone on for 5 months and the cheek of the support to state be patient is ridiculous. Now I am loosing the will to live as every day I have to email to chase for an update and yet most of the time they don’t respond. Please can this be resolved as a matter of urgency. Whoever needs to refund whether it be the process team or manual refund team. Who ever you want to call them. Please return my funds you are holding illegally. The ticket number is 1354619.

list_of_reviews.review_title: ‼️SCAM‼️😥🥲Beware of Gate.io: Scam Practices and Denied Withdrawals
list_of_reviews.review: Folks, if you don’t want to lose your money and want to keep everything intact, do not work with this scammer. It’s not even worth depositing a single USDT with them. I have been using Binance and depositing for years without any issues. I decided to use Gate.io once, and then this happened: About three months ago, I requested a withdrawal of 2400 USDT, which is still pending.I had to create four tickets to reach someone, and then they asked for proof of funds. I submitted all the necessary documents and have been waiting for three months, but no one responds to my tickets or inquiries.Moreover, they asked for an endless list of documents, making me feel insecure – no data protection! Everything possible: photos, credit card numbers, pay slips, registration certificates, names, passports – they demanded everything I own in terms of documents. Even photos with a selfie and the date of the withdrawal, and other ridiculous things that not even the FBI would require. It was all just an excuse to delay the withdrawal and complicate my life. But I was persistent and provided everything until they ran out of excuses. Then they simply stopped responding to my requests. The last email said, “We have forwarded your request to the relevant department.” But the relevant department never responds and takes months, which seems like a lie.You have three days to respond to my tickets 1121343 and 1136953 or simply release my money, otherwise, I will involve my lawyer. What kind of fraud is this? What kind of people are you? This platform is the worst experience I’ve ever had. I can only advise you to stay away, people. It all looks like a scam. There’s no way this platform respects its customers.Lastly: You should be banned. Governments should revoke your licenses, you scammers!

I wanted to withdraw crypto currencies via onchain transaction to my private wallet. After the witdrawal did not process for several days, i wrote a ticket. The customer service apollogized and told me to wait since they have to forward the process to a specialist. After a few days they sent me a message requesting several informations:- Bank statement information about the relevant fiat currency deposit.- Proof of ownership of the bank card used for the transaction, including cardholder information.- A selfie with the bank card clearly showing the date and the account number written on a note.- An explanation of the source of funds and the purpose of the transaction.Since the case is about an onchain crypto transaction, there is no Bank involved so its not possible to give these informations. Additional i proceded several transactions of this kind beforehand without any aditional information.So i guess this is only tactics to win time and distract.After explaining this to the customer service i did not receive any further answer. Just in case they were realy talking about the fiat deposit which i executed beforehands _where they should have checked the legitimacy immediately_ i sended the requested Documents/information, which is realy not easy, since you can only upload one document.I'm waiting for nearly two weaks now.The ticket ID is: 1154131So maybe the customer service is willing to prove that gate.io is not a fraud.

list_of_reviews.review_title: ‼️SCAM‼️😥🥲Beware of Gate.io: Scam Practices and Denied Withdrawals
list_of_reviews.review: Folks, if you don’t want to lose your money and want to keep everything intact, do not work with this scammer. It’s not even worth depositing a single USDT with them. I have been using Binance and depositing for years without any issues. I decided to use Gate.io once, and then this happened: About three months ago, I requested a withdrawal of 2400 USDT, which is still pending.I had to create four tickets to reach someone, and then they asked for proof of funds. I submitted all the necessary documents and have been waiting for three months, but no one responds to my tickets or inquiries.Moreover, they asked for an endless list of documents, making me feel insecure – no data protection! Everything possible: photos, credit card numbers, pay slips, registration certificates, names, passports – they demanded everything I own in terms of documents. Even photos with a selfie and the date of the withdrawal, and other ridiculous things that not even the FBI would require. It was all just an excuse to delay the withdrawal and complicate my life. But I was persistent and provided everything until they ran out of excuses. Then they simply stopped responding to my requests. The last email said, “We have forwarded your request to the relevant department.” But the relevant department never responds and takes months, which seems like a lie.You have three days to respond to my tickets 1121343 and 1136953 or simply release my money, otherwise, I will involve my lawyer. What kind of fraud is this? What kind of people are you? This platform is the worst experience I’ve ever had. I can only advise you to stay away, people. It all looks like a scam. There’s no way this platform respects its customers.Lastly: You should be banned. Governments should revoke your licenses, you scammers!

Gate.io Scammer! please help me and reply to my ticket if you really want to give my money Ticket number: 1136953 I have been waiting for my USDT 2400 payout for two months, support writes back to my ticket once a month with standard messages, they don't respond to emails, very bad support, I feel cheated, I think my money was withdrawn, gate io is a scam

After being fully verified by gate.io for it to unbind the authenticator in late March, they ghosted me and I did not hear from them again. That was over two months ago. Also, their verification method was so antiquated in 2024 that it was a real pain. The same issue I had was resolved by other crypto exchanges including Binance and Kraken within a week after I contacted them. I thought as gate.io is registered in Cayman Islands, it would be relatively reliable. How wrong I was!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: If I could give a rating less than 1…
list_of_reviews.review: If I could give a rating less than 1 star then I would. Guys stay away from this exchange unless you are eventually willing to lose all your funds. You will make 4-5 transactions and all is good (if you’re lucky) then for no reason at all your withdraw will say ‘failed’ and then the fun begins. Their customer service will only respond to you with saved templates, the email responses are slow and vague. After god knows how many days and completely frustrating you (not to mention the potential losses you will occur as you’re unable to trade) if you’re lucky you MIGHT get a refund. It’s just not worth it. And it’s not a one off, this is a regular thing with Gate.io. The worst exchange by far. Stay away, you have been warned. Their telegram group is decent. The admins always reply quickly but all they can do is ‘push your ticket/email’ after that you get an automated frustrating response and you’re in no better situation. They have over $6,000 of mine and I don’t think I’m getting it back. What can you do? Nothing! Hence I said, you’ve been warned.

If you did not stop transfer i could not lose my money. Gateio operate in Europe countries and you can not block money without no reason which transfered by bank in EU so do not accept before. I want my blocked also lost money because of you.I will apply for klagomålscentral in Sweden if i dont get my moneyticket #1371448

Anyway I'll use a local Finnish provider for that and keep my gate account for crypto trades and deposits.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Do not send funds to this...

I've sent over 60 Mails back and forth providing all documents they are asking for. By now I'm fully convinced that Gate.io has absolutely no clue what their customer "service" is actually doing. I submitted all documents 3 times by now and I just an E-Mail asking for the exact same documents. AGAIN. Personally I made peace with the fact that I just got scammed for my money. If you read this: Please don't be like me and ignore the bad reviews telling yourself "that it will be different in my case" - It honestly won't and can just recommend to never deposit money there. EDIT: User-ID 15589422 Ticket #1324874And please stop trying getting my review deleted. I can happily share the 65 E-mails (and counting) that I've sent back and forth with the terrible "support" you offer.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Good way to loos your crypt
list_of_reviews.review: I went thru an account setup and adding my google 2FA with Gate io.   Few months later, attempted to access my account and it would not recognise my google 2FA.  To lodge a support ticket , you have to be logged into your account.  They provide no alternate to google 2FA not working due to system issue on their side.   In essence you are locked out of your account and have no access to your funds.   After a lengthy process , managed to contact support as a guest.  They provided me a link to to remove  my google 2FA connection. However, this requires a cumbersome ID verify that was previously completed.  You have to take pictures holding a sign etc.   You will not have this issue with reputable exchanges like coinex or coinspot etc.   Stay away from this service.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Already waiting for 4 weeks for a solution
list_of_reviews.review: I've been busy to get the remain of some of my tokens from Gate.io for about 4 weeks!They repeatedly told me to update my KYC what I tried to do for a couple of times with my passport details but I cannot finish that process because I 'cannot choose' my country 'the Netherlands' because they removed it from the list for registering so I'm still waiting for a solution.My solutions is to just send the amount to another wallet what they still haven't done so they can remove my account and I have my coins back but somehow they like to receive coins and make money out of it but when it comes to solve it by just sending the amount of coins ( takes some minutes) to another wallet address than it looks like it is hardly possible?What a joke that Gate.io company that it has to take so many weeks and still waiting for them to solve It.

list_of_reviews.review_title: The worst support team and exchange

I sent the coins mistakenly without a memo and didn’t reach my family members account so funds landed in gateio books. I have been messaging there support almost every single day for 9 months and I am still waiting for the funds to be returned. All I get from the support team is your request has been sent to the processing team to refund. So I chase up every day and tell me the same thing which is be patient refunds take time. It’s been 9 months. How much more time do you need. Has the same issue with another exchange and refund was done within 2 days. I just don’t understand what the hold up is. I would strongly recommend staying away from using gateio. Should you need any support you will not be getting it. Also to add. My ticket is 1354619 which is still ongoing. Will keep update for further review and my experience.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I made a mistake and lost about $1,300…
list_of_reviews.review: I made a mistake and lost about $1,300 (I sent the token to the wrong network, which isn’t supported). I was seriously worried I might never see that money again. But in the end, Gate.io turned out to be a reliable platform that actually cares about its users.It took a whole 90 days to get my money back—trust me, it felt like forever—but Gate.io’s support team did manage to recover my funds. The hardest part was how little they communicated with me during the process. Most of the time, I had no idea what they were doing, and that made the wait even more stressful.Dealing with their support wasn’t easy—communication was often unclear, and it was hard to not know what was going on. But even with these frustrations, I can say that Gate.io is a safe platform. They could have easily ignored my case, but they didn’t. That shows they really do care about helping users, even if they don’t always keep you in the loop.If you ever find yourself in a similar situation, just be patient. The support process can be slow, and the lack of communication is frustrating, but in the end, Gate.io is a platform you can trust to get your money back.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I made a mistake and lost about $1,300…
list_of_reviews.review: I made a mistake and lost about $1,300 (I sent the token to the wrong network, which isn’t supported). I was seriously worried I might never see that money again. But in the end, Gate.io turned out to be a reliable platform that actually cares about its users.It took a whole 90 days to get my money back—trust me, it felt like forever—but Gate.io’s support team did manage to recover my funds. The hardest part was how little they communicated with me during the process. Most of the time, I had no idea what they were doing, and that made the wait even more stressful.Dealing with their support wasn’t easy—communication was often unclear, and it was hard to not know what was going on. But even with these frustrations, I can say that Gate.io is a safe platform. They could have easily ignored my case, but they didn’t. That shows they really do care about helping users, even if they don’t always keep you in the loop.If you ever find yourself in a similar situation, just be patient. The support process can be slow, and the lack of communication is frustrating, but in the end, Gate.io is a platform you can trust to get your money back.

The support process can be slow, and the lack of communication is frustrating, but in the end, Gate.io is a platform you can trust to get your money back.

1,5 years ao I registered my account and have all verified (Identity and address verification). Yesterday I bought 1,500 usdt with my credit card using their third party gateway (MoonPay). After MoonPay confirmed the payment and transfered the coins to gate.io, I wanted to withdraw them to my OKX account. Four hours later I contacted the support because the withdraw was still verifying and they told me I have to send a picture of me with the credit card and a written text and some more documents to their mail address. I answered them that the credit card is a virtual card and for security reasons I can´t send my documents by mail. The answer from them was that then I´ll not receive my coins neither the withdraw will be canceled, it will stucks in "verifying".For me that´s a scam as 1. I didn´t bought the coins from them so there´s no reason to ask me for my credit card, and 2. why should I send my documents by mail if I did all my KYC with them?Order-ID: 62417175Ticket-ID: 1193673

list_of_reviews.review_title: Good way to loos your crypt
list_of_reviews.review: I went thru an account setup and adding my google 2FA with Gate io.   Few months later, attempted to access my account and it would not recognise my google 2FA.  To lodge a support ticket , you have to be logged into your account.  They provide no alternate to google 2FA not working due to system issue on their side.   In essence you are locked out of your account and have no access to your funds.   After a lengthy process , managed to contact support as a guest.  They provided me a link to to remove  my google 2FA connection. However, this requires a cumbersome ID verify that was previously completed.  You have to take pictures holding a sign etc.   You will not have this issue with reputable exchanges like coinex or coinspot etc.   Stay away from this service.

Thank you for resolving the issue that I had, you are amazing guys!

list_of_reviews.review_title: I made a mistake and lost about $1,300…
list_of_reviews.review: I made a mistake and lost about $1,300 (I sent the token to the wrong network, which isn’t supported). I was seriously worried I might never see that money again. But in the end, Gate.io turned out to be a reliable platform that actually cares about its users.It took a whole 90 days to get my money back—trust me, it felt like forever—but Gate.io’s support team did manage to recover my funds. The hardest part was how little they communicated with me during the process. Most of the time, I had no idea what they were doing, and that made the wait even more stressful.Dealing with their support wasn’t easy—communication was often unclear, and it was hard to not know what was going on. But even with these frustrations, I can say that Gate.io is a safe platform. They could have easily ignored my case, but they didn’t. That shows they really do care about helping users, even if they don’t always keep you in the loop.If you ever find yourself in a similar situation, just be patient. The support process can be slow, and the lack of communication is frustrating, but in the end, Gate.io is a platform you can trust to get your money back.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Unfair Treatment and Poor Customer Support - Stay Away!
list_of_reviews.review: I had a terrible experience with Gate.io. As a p2p seller, I was falsely accused of misconduct in a transaction, and the customer support was biased, unhelpful, and unprofessional. They ignored clear evidence, pressured me to log into an account I didn't own, and sided with the buyer, who acted irresponsibly by following instructions from an unverified source.The support team, especially Jaylie and P2P_Aria, were dismissive and driven by emotions rather than facts. They threatened to release funds to the buyer despite my legitimate proof. To make matters worse, they completely ignored my email and ticket, leaving me with no resolution. The platform's handling of disputes is abysmal, putting sellers at a huge risk. I wouldn’t trust Gate.io with any transactions again. Don’t make the mistake of joining this platform—your money and peace of mind are at risk!my ticket: 1195154my uid: 16965437

list_of_reviews.review_title: Good way to loos your crypt
list_of_reviews.review: I went thru an account setup and adding my google 2FA with Gate io.   Few months later, attempted to access my account and it would not recognise my google 2FA. list_of_reviews.review_title: I made a mistake and lost about $1,300…
list_of_reviews.review: I made a mistake and lost about $1,300 (I sent the token to the wrong network, which isn’t supported). I was seriously worried I might never see that money again. But in the end, Gate.io turned out to be a reliable platform that actually cares about its users.It took a whole 90 days to get my money back—trust me, it felt like forever—but Gate.io’s support team did manage to recover my funds. The hardest part was how little they communicated with me during the process. Most of the time, I had no idea what they were doing, and that made the wait even more stressful.Dealing with their support wasn’t easy—communication was often unclear, and it was hard to not know what was going on. But even with these frustrations, I can say that Gate.io is a safe platform. They could have easily ignored my case, but they didn’t. That shows they really do care about helping users, even if they don’t always keep you in the loop.If you ever find yourself in a similar situation, just be patient. The support process can be slow, and the lack of communication is frustrating, but in the end, Gate.io is a platform you can trust to get your money back.
Thank you for resolving the issue that I had, you are amazing guys!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Unfair Treatment and Poor Customer Support - Stay Away!
list_of_reviews.review: I had a terrible experience with Gate.io. As a p2p seller, I was falsely accused of misconduct in a transaction, and the customer support was biased, unhelpful, and unprofessional. They threatened to release funds to the buyer despite my legitimate proof. To make matters worse, they completely ignored my email and ticket, leaving me with no resolution. The platform's handling of disputes is abysmal, putting sellers at a huge risk. I wouldn’t trust Gate.io with any transactions again. list_of_reviews.review_title: I made a mistake and lost about $1,300…

But in the end, Gate.io turned out to be a reliable platform that actually cares about its users.It took a whole 90 days to get my money back—trust me, it felt like forever—but Gate.io’s support team did manage to recover my funds. The hardest part was how little they communicated with me during the process. Most of the time, I had no idea what they were doing, and that made the wait even more stressful.Dealing with their support wasn’t easy—communication was often unclear, and it was hard to not know what was going on. But even with these frustrations, I can say that Gate.io is a safe platform. They could have easily ignored my case, but they didn’t. That shows they really do care about helping users, even if they don’t always keep you in the loop.If you ever find yourself in a similar situation, just be patient. The support process can be slow, and the lack of communication is frustrating, but in the end, Gate.io is a platform you can trust to get your money back.

They are then requesting bank statements for the past 8 MONTHS, selfie with the card and statement for the particular transaction. But guess what? This transaction is on hold like every other recent transaction! You cannot provide a statement for a transaction that is on hold and you normally give them a screenshot from your banking, but they wouldn't accept it. I even send them 2 selfies with bank card and my personal ID as additional proof, but no. And guess what? It happens to me for a 3rd time this year! Last two times I waited 4 and 5 days each, now I am waiting for a 3rd day. I was to buy altcoins with the stablecoins I bought from them and grand total loss is over $2,000 (for not buying on time, and they went up). Previous time they hold a transaction for like $1,500. I then tried to withdraw another like $100, but naturally it didn't work. I started talking with their support, they tortured me for 5 days and at the end they were like "Hey, good news... we released your funds.". You go back and check to see that your $100 are transferred, but not the $1,500. You go back to them and explain that everything started with the $1,500 and guess what? They ask you again for bank statements, selfies, pics of your girlfriend, mother, sister... Can you imagine the stupidity of this?! And all this despite you are KYC'd on the exchange years ago and you have used same bank account before. And you proved it's yours before! UNBELIAVABLE! Every time you try to talk with their "support", they'd send you some prepared answer (template) to "please wait patiently" like you are an idiot! THE WORSE GUYS, THE WORSE! AVOID LIKE A PLAGUE!

I swear to God... these guys are THE WORSE! I have over 11 years in crypto and I have never ever seen such unprofessional behavior! They are repeatedly asking for bank statements, selfies, and such, despite you already provided them. I will give you an example. I am buying stable coin, then I am trying to withdraw, but they wouldn't allow the transaction. They are then requesting bank statements for the past 8 MONTHS, selfie with the card and statement for the particular transaction. But guess what? This transaction is on hold like every other recent transaction! You cannot provide a statement for a transaction that is on hold and you normally give them a screenshot from your banking, but they wouldn't accept it. I even send them 2 selfies with bank card and my personal ID as additional proof, but no. And guess what? It happens to me for a 3rd time this year! Last two times I waited 4 and 5 days each, now I am waiting for a 3rd day. I was to buy altcoins with the stablecoins I bought from them and grand total loss is over $2,000 (for not buying on time, and they went up). Previous time they hold a transaction for like $1,500. I then tried to withdraw another like $100, but naturally it didn't work. I started talking with their support, they tortured me for 5 days and at the end they were like "Hey, good news... we released your funds.". You go back and check to see that your $100 are transferred, but not the $1,500. You go back to them and explain that everything started with the $1,500 and guess what? They ask you again for bank statements, selfies, pics of your girlfriend, mother, sister... Can you imagine the stupidity of this?! And all this despite you are KYC'd on the exchange years ago and you have used same bank account before. And you proved it's yours before! UNBELIAVABLE! Every time you try to talk with their "support", they'd send you some prepared answer (template) to "please wait patiently" like you are an idiot! THE WORSE GUYS, THE WORSE! AVOID LIKE A PLAGUE!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Unfair Treatment and Poor Customer Support - Stay Away!
list_of_reviews.review: I had a terrible experience with Gate.io. As a p2p seller, I was falsely accused of misconduct in a transaction, and the customer support was biased, unhelpful, and unprofessional. They ignored clear evidence, pressured me to log into an account I didn't own, and sided with the buyer, who acted irresponsibly by following instructions from an unverified source.The support team, especially Jaylie and P2P_Aria, were dismissive and driven by emotions rather than facts. They threatened to release funds to the buyer despite my legitimate proof. To make matters worse, they completely ignored my email and ticket, leaving me with no resolution. The platform's handling of disputes is abysmal, putting sellers at a huge risk. I wouldn’t trust Gate.io with any transactions again. Don’t make the mistake of joining this platform—your money and peace of mind are at risk!my ticket: 1195154my uid: 16965437

1,5 years ao I registered my account and have all verified (Identity and address verification). Yesterday I bought 1,500 usdt with my credit card using their third party gateway (MoonPay). After MoonPay confirmed the payment and transfered the coins to gate.io, I wanted to withdraw them to my OKX account. Four hours later I contacted the support because the withdraw was still verifying and they told me I have to send a picture of me with the credit card and a written text and some more documents to their mail address. I answered them that the credit card is a virtual card and for security reasons I can´t send my documents by mail. The answer from them was that then I´ll not receive my coins neither the withdraw will be canceled, it will stucks in "verifying".For me that´s a scam as 1. I didn´t bought the coins from them so there´s no reason to ask me for my credit card, and 2. why should I send my documents by mail if I did all my KYC with them?Order-ID: 62417175Ticket-ID: 1193673

list_of_reviews.review_title: I made a mistake and lost about $1,300…
list_of_reviews.review: I made a mistake and lost about $1,300 (I sent the token to the wrong network, which isn’t supported). I was seriously worried I might never see that money again. But in the end, Gate.io turned out to be a reliable platform that actually cares about its users.It took a whole 90 days to get my money back—trust me, it felt like forever—but Gate.io’s support team did manage to recover my funds. The hardest part was how little they communicated with me during the process. Most of the time, I had no idea what they were doing, and that made the wait even more stressful.Dealing with their support wasn’t easy—communication was often unclear, and it was hard to not know what was going on. But even with these frustrations, I can say that Gate.io is a safe platform. They could have easily ignored my case, but they didn’t. That shows they really do care about helping users, even if they don’t always keep you in the loop.If you ever find yourself in a similar situation, just be patient. The support process can be slow, and the lack of communication is frustrating, but in the end, Gate.io is a platform you can trust to get your money back.
